entry.dcterms:description: family planning, fertility, birth control, marriage stability and influencing factors
entry.dcterms:subject: social behaviour and attitudes
childbearing, family planning and abortion
housing
family life, marriage, relationship
gender and gender roles
person
survey data
panel
A national representative 5% sample of marriages contracted in 1966.
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers. The questionnaires were administered by district nurses, mostly in the homes of the respondents.
A
